channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ウクライナ外務省、「白い蓮」シーズン3にミロシュ・ビコビッチを起用したHBOを批判、セルビア人俳優がロシアを支持していると証拠もなく発言（Christopher Kuo/New York Times）
item.description:
Christopher Kuo / New York Times:
Ukraine's foreign ministry criticizes HBO for casting Milos Bikovic in The White Lotus' season three, saying without evidence the Serbian actor supports Russia  —  On social media, Ukraine's foreign ministry posted clips of the Serbian actor Milos Bikovic receiving a medal for cultural achievement from Vladimir Putin in 2018.

item.title: プレックスは、2021年に調達した5000万ドルを上回る新たな資金を調達し、2024年末までに黒字化を見込んでいる（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Plex raised new funding, larger than the $50M funding it raised in 2021, and expects to be profitable by the end of 2024  —  Media streamer Plex has raised new capital.  The company, which began as a media organization startup, has morphed over the years to become a one-stop shop for all your media …

item.title: TikTokは、動画内のオブジェクトを識別し、ユーザーに「TikTok Shopで類似品を探す」よう促すことで、すべての投稿を買い物可能にする機能をテスト中（Alex Barinka/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Alex Barinka / Bloomberg:
TikTok is testing a feature that could make all posts shoppable, by identifying objects in videos and prompting users to “find similar items on TikTok Shop”  —  - Feature links products to any posts, not just influencers  —  TikTok is testing a feature that could make all posts shoppable …

item.title: ブルームバーグ、AIが作成した企業の決算説明会サマリーを端末で提供開始、端末の契約者数は31万人超（Chris Roush/Talking Biz News）
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
Bloomberg starts providing AI-generated summaries of companies' earnings calls on its terminal; the company has more than 310,000 subscribers to its terminal  —  Bloomberg is now providing artificial intelligence summaries of company's earnings calls on its terminal.

item.title: シリウスXMが、ウィル・アーネット、ジェイソン・ベイトマン、ショーン・ヘイズによるポッドキャスト「SmartLess」の権利を1億ドル以上で取得。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sirius XM acquires rights to SmartLess, a podcast by Will Arnett, Jason Bateman, and Sean Hayes, sources say for $100M+; Amazon previously paid $60M-$80M  —  - The popular interview program has spent three years at Amazon  — Actors Will Arnett, Jason Bateman and Sean Hayes host the show

item.title: Mail Online社幹部へのインタビュー：全英ユーザーへの月額4.99ポンドの新価格帯「Mail+」の展開、月額12.99ポンドの「Mail+ Editions」アプリなどについて（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An interview with Mail Online executives on rolling out its new £4.99 per month Mail+ tier to all UK users, the £12.99 per month Mail+ Editions app, and more  —  Mail Online is building on a “great position of strength” from its “huge, loyal, engaged, direct audience” …

item.title: 英国、ITVの報道でイラン人テレビ司会者2人の英国での暗殺計画に関与が判明したイラン政府関係者を制裁（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
UK sanctions Iranian officials who were found by an ITV report to be involved in plots to assassinate two TV presenters from Iran International in the UK  —  Britain on Monday imposed sanctions on Iranian officials it said were involved in threats to kill journalists on British soil …

item.title: ニールセン：2023年に最も視聴されたストリーミング・オリジナルはTed Lassoで、Apple TV+のフットプリントが小さいにもかかわらず、16.9B分だった。
item.description:
Katie Campione / Deadline:
Nielsen: Ted Lasso was the most-watched streaming original in 2023, at 16.9B minutes, despite Apple TV+'s small footprint, followed by Netflix's The Night Agent  —  Ted Lasso went out on a high note at Apple TV+.  —  According to Nielsen, the series was the most-watched streaming original last year …

item.title: スポーツ・イラストレイテッド社の労働組合が、今月の大量解雇後の報復と組合潰しを主張し、NLRBに不当労働行為を告発（Ben Strauss/Washington Post紙）
item.description:
Ben Strauss / Washington Post:
Sports Illustrated's union files an unfair labor practice charge with the NLRB, alleging retaliation and union-busting after the mass layoffs this month  —  The union representing the staff of Sports Illustrated filed an unfair labor practice charge against the magazine's publisher …

item.title: アマゾンは、プライム・ビデオの1時間あたりの平均広告時間は2～3.5分と、従来のテレビやほとんどのストリーミング・サービスを下回り、月間視聴者数は1億5900万人に達すると見込んでいる（Suzanne Vranica/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Suzanne Vranica / Wall Street Journal:
Amazon expects Prime Video's average hourly ad load to be 2 to 3.5 minutes, below traditional TV and most streaming services, and to reach 159M monthly viewers  —  Move prompts longtime subscribers to cancel Prime altogether, forgoing free shipping; ‘There is only one way to show them that this is not OK’

item.title: メモチャンネル4は5年間のファストフォワード計画の一環として、テレビドラマや映画などの制作部門を統合し、ロンドンから撤退することなどを計画している（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Memo: Channel 4 plans to merge commissioning departments, including TV drama and film, leave a London premises, and more, part of a five-year Fast Forward plan  —  Channel 4 is merging several commissioning departments including TV drama and film and leaving its Horseferry Road premises …

item.title: チャンネル4は、「2030年までにデジタルファーストの公共サービスストリーマー」になるため、スタッフの18％をレイオフし、～200人の雇用に影響を与え、～40の未充填の職務を閉鎖する計画である（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Channel 4 plans to lay off 18% of its staff, impacting ~200 jobs and closing ~40 unfilled roles, to become a “digital-first public service streamer by 2030”  —  “Channel 4 was designed to be ahead of the curve and has never stood still,” says CEO Alex Mahon.

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙によると、2023年のパズルやゲームのプレイ回数は80億回を超え、Wordleが48億回、NYT Gamesアプリが1,000万ダウンロードを記録した（Alex Fitzpatrick/Axios）
item.description:
Alex Fitzpatrick / Axios:
The New York Times says users played its puzzles and games more than 8B times in 2023, led by Wordle with 4.8B plays, and the NYT Games app had 10M downloads  —  The New York Times' puzzle and games were played more than 8 billion times last year, the company tells Axios exclusively …

item.title: ジョージ・カーリンの遺族からの訴えに対し、Dudesy社は「AI」ジョージ・カーリンのYouTube動画とポッドキャストは「2人の人間によって作成された」と述べている（Kyle Orland/Ars Technica）。
item.description:
Kyle Orland / Ars Technica:
In response to the George Carlin estate's lawsuit, Dudesy says its YouTube video and podcast with an “AI” George Carlin were “created by two human beings”  —  Creators still face “name and likeness” complaints; lawyer says suit will continue.

item.title: ペンギン・ランダムハウスが「知的自由」タスクフォースなどを通じて、米国の学校図書館から本を撤去することに積極的に異議を唱え始めた理由（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
How Penguin Random House started actively challenging the removal of books from US school libraries, including through an “Intellectual Freedom” task force  —  A fiery board meeting inspired Penguin Random House to actively challenge the removal of books from school libraries
